criminal_records.source: In June 2018, she was given a police superintendent’s caution for the offences of common assault and theft. In November 2018, she was sentenced to 24 months’ probation for the offences of wounding with intent to do grievous bodily harm and criminal damage. That probation order was subsequently extended for a further 6 months which would indicate trouble from her during the probation period and a breach of that probation.

positive_habits_after_arrest.source: I have received a letter in mitigation and evidence of her further recent vocational training to set herself up in employment in the future. She went on to assist the police and agreed to be a prosecution witness against Fu.
